dataset_id: Forest Inventories at Burned and Unburned Tropical Forest Sites, Acre, Brazil, 2014
title: Forest Inventories at Burned and Unburned Tropical Forest Sites, Acre, Brazil, 2014
summary: This dataset provides measurements for diameter at breast height (DBH) and species identification of trees for inventories taken at five tropical forest sites in Acre state, Brazil, in the southwestern Amazon region. The sites included one in a forest reserve (Reserva Bonal) and four within forest fragments situated on private property. The inventory sites included forests burned in 2005 and 2010 and also unburned forests. Surveys were conducted in July and August 2014.
